com.lixia.rdp.keymapping

Class MapDef

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.lixia.rdp.keymapping.MapDef

  • public class MapDef
extends java.lang.Object

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      MapDef(char keyChar, int keyLocation, int scancode, boolean ctrlDown, boolean shiftDown, boolean altDown, boolean capslockDown)
      Constructor for a character-defined mapping definition
      MapDef(int keyCode, int keyLocation, int scancode, boolean ctrlDown, boolean shiftDown, boolean altDown, boolean capslockDown)
      Constructor for a keycode-defined mapping definition
      MapDef(java.lang.String definition)
      Constructor for a mapping definition based on a given string representation (as would be output to a stream by the writeToStream method).

      Return true if the keystroke defined in this mapping requires that the Alt key be down

      Return true if the keystroke defined in this mapping requires that Caps Lock is on

      Return true if this mapping is defined by a character, false otherwise

      Return the number of modifiers that would need to be changed to send the specified character/key using this particular mapping.

      Output this mapping definition to a stream, formatted as a single line (characterDef character/keycode location scancode modifiers [description])

        public MapDef(java.lang.String definition)
       throws KeyMapException
        Constructor for a mapping definition based on a given string representation (as would be output to a stream by the writeToStream method).
        Parameters:
        definition - One-line definition string
        Throws:
        KeyMapException - Any parsing errors which may occur
